scripts.all: npm run clean && pnpm install && npm run build && npm run check && npm run tests
scripts.clean: npm run smart-clean && npm run dapp-clean && npm run wp-clean && npm run sub-clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.install: npm run wp-install && npx cypress install
scripts.build: npm run smart-build && npm run dapp-build && npm run wp-build && npm run sub-build
scripts.check: npm run smart-check && npm run dapp-check && npm run wp-check && npm run sub-check
scripts.tests: npm run smart-tests && npm run dapp-tests && npm run wp-tests && npm run sub-tests
scripts.smart-check: npx prettier-eslint solidity/**/*.sol scripts/*js scripts/*.sh tests/*js --write
scripts.wp-clean: rm -rf wordpress/vendor wordpress/kredeum-nfts/vendor wordpress/kredeum-nfts/readme.txt wordpress/kredeum-nfts/kredeum-nfts.php wordpress/kredeum-nfts/lib/js
scripts.wp-dev: rollup -c && mkdir -p wordpress/kredeum-nfts/lib/js && cp app/build/kredeum-nft.js wordpress/kredeum-nfts/lib/js
scripts.wp-build-txt: npx hbs-cli -D config/wordpress.json wordpress/readme.txt_handlebars -o wordpress/kredeum-nfts -e txt
scripts.wp-build-php: npx hbs-cli -D config/wordpress.json wordpress/kredeum-nfts.php_handelbars -o wordpress/kredeum-nfts -e php
scripts.wp-build-js: PROD=true rollup -c && mkdir -p wordpress/kredeum-nfts/lib/js && cp app/build/kredeum-nft.js wordpress/kredeum-nfts/lib/js
scripts.wp-build: npm run wp-build-txt && npm run wp-build-php && npm run wp-build-js && npm run wp-build-vendor
scripts.wp-check: npm run wp-fix && npm run wp-format
scripts.sub-yaml: npx jq '.[]|select(.chainName=="${NETWORK:-mumbai}")' config/networks.json | npx hbs-cli -i thegraph/subgraph.yaml_handlebar -e yaml -o thegraph
scripts.sub-build: npm run sub-yaml && npm run sub-codegen && npm run sub-graph-build
scripts.sub-check: npx prettier-eslint thegraph/**/*js thegraph/**/*.ts thegraph/**/*.json thegraph/**/*.yaml thegraph/**/*.graphql thegraph/**/*.md --write
scripts.sub-predeploy: npm run sub-clean && npm run sub-yaml && npm run sub-codegen && npm run sub-build && npm run sub-check
scripts.sub-deploy: npm run sub-predeploy && cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/eip721-${NETWORK:-mumbai} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $THEGRAPH_KEY
